name: SFD : Rogue TRPG
description: SFD is a unique hybrid of tactical RPG and roguelike. Manage a party of adventurers as you attempt to be one of the few to conquer the Sigma Finite Dungeon.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows windows support java 8 Graphics: OpenGL 3.2 supported graphics card Storage: 200 MB available space Additional Notes: Executable file is just executable jar file wrapped with jdk 8
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
